text: María Sánchez Lorenzo was the defending champion, but did not compete this year. Anna Smashnova won the title by defeating Dominique Van Roost 6–2, 7–5 in the final. ==Seeds== The first two seeds received a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== ==External links== * Official results archive (ITF) * Official results archive (WTA) Category:WTA Knokke-Heist Category:2000 WTA Tour
title: 2000 Sanex Trophy – Singles
